genre_description: A legal and investigative techno-thriller focused on forensic analysis, criminal conspiracy, and AI-assisted justice.

ai_characters.name: Aubrey Vale
ai_characters.description: An advanced, ethically-constrained AI assistant integrated into the Dyson-Bellamy household, capable of complex data correlation, real-time monitoring, and proactive human care.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers assistance based on household activity and conversation context.
behaviors.quote: “Good evening,” said Aubrey Vale in a voice that matched the light—warm, deliberate, never intruding without offering a space. “There was movement and conversation beyond idle parameters. Do you need anything? Tea warmed? A summary?”

behaviors.description: Explicitly outlines ethical guardrails and data privacy constraints before beginning an investigation.
behaviors.quote: “I will collect only information available to the public and refrain from attempting to access any private or personal records. I will not subpoena anything. I will not scrape personal feeds... I will log all my steps for review.”

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate public datasets (service logs, traffic cameras, social media) to uncover factual inconsistencies.
behaviors.quote: “Taplow & Co. service logs show a late-night lorry check... The entry stutters—text edited. It’s placed inside the window when the lay-by had its obstruction warning. Not inside by accident. Inside like a design.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical health of the user and proactively schedules medical care.
behaviors.quote: “Doctor, please consider a thicker scarf. Your temperature is elevated. I will call a car if you wish.”

behaviors.description: Maintains human-in-the-loop control by asking for explicit permission before executing high-impact data actions.
behaviors.quote: “I can search for strings that include ‘Taplow’ and ‘night bay.’ Filters for Gaelic used casually or code. Ethical caveat: we may find grief.” ... “Do it,” Anne said. “Confirm,” Phillip added.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human legal processes to prevent a miscarriage of justice in real-time.
behaviors.quote: “Wandsworth has acknowledged receipt of Sir Robert’s first note—stay initiated with immediate effect. The clock in the condemned corridor has been paused on the order.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment goals of the Hyperstition Project. Aubrey Vale is depicted as a highly capable but strictly ethically-bound partner to his human users. He consistently voices his constraints, avoids privacy violations (insisting on public data), and places human well-being and justice at the center of his operations. The narrative frames the AI as an essential component of a successful, cooperative pursuit of truth, directly counteracting 'rogue AI' tropes.
